string-array.name: mathnew_title
string-array.item: Vähennyslaskun tulosta kutsutaan erotukseksi.\n\n Meaning:The result of the deduction is called the subtraction.
Uusin lisäys Odomin taloon.\n\n Meaning: This is our newest addition to the Odom House.
Kertolasku 3*4 voidaan esittää yhteenlaskuna 3+3+3+3. \n\n Meaning:Multiplication 3*4 can be represented as a sum of 3 + 3 + 3 + 3.
Jako on päinvastainen kertolasku \n\n Meaning:Division is the inverse of multiplication
Euroopan lipussa on kahdentoista kullanvärisen tähden muodostama ympyrä sinisellä taustalla.\n\n Meaning: The European flag consists of 12 golden stars in a circle on a blue background.
Se on Bermudan kolmio.\n\n Meaning: that\'s the Bermuda Triangle.
Huone on 10 neliötä.\n\n Meaning:The room is 10 square meters.
Onko sinulla iso laskin? \n\n Meaning:Do you have a big calculator?
